html:
** Cannabis products maker's shares YCBD.N up 17.3% at $1.74 after it announces partnership with Amify Inc for inclusion of its cannabidiol (CBD) products on Amazon's AMZN.O Marketplace

** Amify will act as cbdMD's exclusive CBD partner to launch products on the Amazon platform as soon as the category is accepted and becomes available, co says

** Partnership includes cbdMD's branded products including gummies, tinctures, gelcaps, Paw CBD animal brand and new line of skin care and beauty products (Full Story)

** YCBD adds that AMZN is likely to become a major platform for CBD product distribution as CBD interest has grown exponentially since passage of the U.S. Farm Bill in 2018

** Earlier this month, cbdMD extended its advertising deal with Spotify SPOT.N and Joe Rogan Experience (Full Story)

** YTD, YCBD shares have dipped ~50%


(Reporting by Anisha Sircar in Bengaluru)

(( Anisha.Sircar@thomsonreuters.com ;))
